title: Whirlpool 215 L Direct Cool Single Door 3 Star Refrigerator  (Alpha Steel, 230 IMPRO PRM 3S ALPHA STEEL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, Warranty Card and User Manual
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor from Whirlpool
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Overview: This Whirlpool refrigerator comes with a crescent door design, along with a breath arc handle. The fine craftsmanship and impressive precision in the making of this appliance ensure that you get to buy a lovely product for your home.

review:
Good refrigerator at this . 215 litres capacity and 5 star ⭐ rating. It's sufficient at this price range.
Magic chilled try is so useful. Less power consumption.
Look wise it's good. Crome design handle looks good. Sufficient space inside refrigerator.
No noise. So silent. No heating.

The best refrigerator in budget for family of 3-4 members.But I have an issue that I was not known that flipkart will only dilever the product they will not install it.That's why I called flipkart customer service.Then they told me that this product doesn't need any installation you have to just plug the pin in electric board.Then I installed it myself.Inslallation was so easy for me.And now I am very happy with the product's quality.Thanks Flipkart for delivering me such a wonder ful product.
Nice, but better to buy in offer time like big billion days ...now also value for money I liked it...

Very happy with the product. My previous refrigerator was Whirlpool bought on 1993. Worked till 2021. And now I bought this. Hoping for another 25 years of seamless experience. Delivery was smooth and uneventful. Installation guys will contact 2-3 days after. Till then, I can plug in and follow directions for usage from the manual. Thank you for the product and its delivery.
Refrigerator excellent cooling capabilities and it cools down so fast. It works fine and it saves electricity too. If you are look for one. Must buy it.
Good product , no installation needed, features r good, compressor warranty is very good ,no voice while running , inside space is nice one , overall good product.
Nice attractive color no any sound smooth run best 5star refrigerator and on time delivery by flipcart

Fridge is really really osm.... Size is perfect if u guys looking for bigger fridge in budget then blindly go for this.... Perfect for 3-4 member... only con in ordering online is about the dents... My fridge got 2 dents on left side I don know wether it's sent like this or while unloading it got dent... Packing was not upto mark ... Seller could have used more thermocol ....so that dent could be avoided....

After using for 9 months, water leaks from the discarded water storage unit as it overloads with discarded water and there is no heater provided to vaporise the water from the discarded water storage.
Service engineer said single door refrigerator from whirlpool does not have the water heater to evaporate the discarded water and it needs manual removal of water.
I have never faced such issues with the 25 year old godrej single door refrigerator that I have replaced with this one.

Fridge was delivered in just a day (12hrs infact) of ordering and the delivery process was smooth. The installation from Whirlpool side was delayed but the experience was still great, I had to call the Whirlpool customer care to get the installation done on priority and was surprised that they already had all the order details mapped to my phone number and expedited the process in under 5 mins. Installation was done by the technician (guy named Vivith) in about 10 mins, explained all the usual stuff, answered all my technical/mundane queries very well and gave good suggestions on how to use the product. Great experience from both Flipkart and Whirlpool.
